mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Leaves where joinday is null;
mapper.update: UPDATE Leaves SET joinday = #{joinday}, leave_regular = CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(), STR_TO_DATE(#{joinday}, '%Y-%m-%d')) < 365 THEN 11 -- 1년 미만 WHEN DATEDIFF(NOW(), STR_TO_DATE(#{joinday}, '%Y-%m-%d')) < 730 THEN 15 -- 2년 미만 ELSE LEAST(25, FLOOR((DATEDIFF(NOW(), STR_TO_DATE(#{joinday}, '%Y-%m-%d')) - 729) / 730) + 15) END WHERE id = #{id};
